INSERT INTO builds(description) VALUES("Build para Update v1.0");
SELECT* FROM builds;
select created_at from updates order by created_at desc limit 1

SELECT sql_sentence FROM sql_sentences where sql_sentence_id in ( select sql_sentence_id from build_sql_sentences where build_id in (select build_id from updates where created_at > "2021-12-02 18:31:23" order by created_at));

SELECT sql_sentence FROM sql_sentences where sql_sentence_id in ( select sql_sentence_id from build_sql_sentences where build_id in (select build_id from updates where created_at > "2021-12-02 18:31:23" order by created_at));

SELECT sql_sentence FROM sql_sentences where sql_sentence_id in ( select sql_sentence_id from build_sql_sentences where build_id in (select build_id from updates where created_at > "2021-12-02 18:31:23" order by created_at));
SELECT * FROM updates ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
